pages.text: Via devilish courier, this ritual summons $(l:bewitchment:creatures/baphomet)Baphomet$(); you'll want to keep them away from other beings.$(br2)Prepare $(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)$(item)Grotesque Stew$(), should you want to pledge to them.
The ritual is started by sacrificing a $(marked)Sheep$() with an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)$(item)Athame$().
